bt.net

Interface HandshakeHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BitfieldConnectionHandler, ExtendedProtocolHandshakeHandler

    public interface HandshakeHandler
    Extension point for additional processing of incoming and outgoing handshakes.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void processIncomingHandshake(PeerConnection connection, Handshake peerHandshake)
      Process an incoming handshake, received from a remote peer.
      void processOutgoingHandshake(Handshake handshake)
      Make amendments to an outgoing handshake, that will be sent to a remote peer.

    • Method Detail

      • processIncomingHandshake

        void processIncomingHandshake(PeerConnection connection,
                              Handshake peerHandshake)
        Process an incoming handshake, received from a remote peer. Implementations are free to send messages via the provided connection and may choose to close it if some of their expectations about the handshake are not met. Attempt to read from the provided connection will trigger an UnsupportedOperationException.
        Since:
        1.1

      • processOutgoingHandshake

        void processOutgoingHandshake(Handshake handshake)
        Make amendments to an outgoing handshake, that will be sent to a remote peer.
        Since:
        1.0
